Admissions to the Bachelor of Engineering programs at Acharya Institute of Technology are conducted through KCET, COMEDK, or Management Quota. Candidates must have passed 10 & 12 with Physics and Mathematics as compulsory subjects and obtained a minimum of 65 percent aggregate marks.

Our college offers BE (CSE, ISE, ME, EE, CE, BT), BBA with specializations in Marketing, Finance, Human Resource Management, and Business Analytics, BCA with specializations in Cloud Computing, Data Science, Artificial Intelligence, and Web Development, along with MBA and M.Tech programs across various specializations.

The annual fee for the Bachelor of Engineering program is approximately 2.7 lakh rupees per year. The fee for MBA is around 1.5 lakh rupees, MCA about 1.2 lakh rupees, and M.Tech about 1.25 lakh rupees. Hostel accommodation costs approximately 60000 rupees per year.

Fee structure is as follows Bachelor of Engineering 2.7 lakh per year, MBA 1.5 lakh per year, MCA 1.2 lakh per year, and M.Tech 1.25 lakh per year. Hostel charges are approximately 60000 rupees per year.

The annual fee at Acharya Institute of Technology varies depending on the program. Engineering programs cost around 2.7 lakh rupees per year while postgraduate programs range between 1.2 lakh and 1.5 lakh rupees annually.
Course fees at AIT are B.E. 2.7 lakh per year, MBA 1.5 lakh per year, MCA 1.2 lakh per year, and M.Tech 1.25 lakh per year. Hostel and mess charges are extra.

patterns: tell me about acharya institute of technology
what is acharya institute of technology
details of acharya institute of technology
responses: Acharya Institute of Technology, established in 2000, is one of the top engineering colleges in Bengaluru. It is affiliated with Visvesvaraya Technological University, Belagavi, and approved by AICTE, New Delhi. The college offers state of the art infrastructure, highly qualified faculty, and a vibrant campus life across a 120 acre campus.

Acharya Institute of Technology is a leading institution under Acharya Institutes, offering quality education in engineering, management, and technology. It is located in Soladevanahalli, Bengaluru, and is affiliated with VTU Belagavi.
Founded in 2000, Acharya Institute of Technology is a premier technical institute that provides undergraduate and postgraduate programs with modern facilities and industry focused learning.
AIT Bengaluru is well known for its academic excellence, research driven programs, and global exposure opportunities for students.

patterns: how are placements at acharya institute of technology
highest package in acharya institute of technology
responses: Acharya Institute of Technology has a strong placement record with top recruiters like Infosys, Wipro, TCS, Accenture, IBM, Capgemini, and Tech Mahindra. The highest package offered is around 15 lakh rupees per annum and the average package is approximately 4 to 5 lakh rupees per annum.
AIT maintains an excellent placement history with reputed companies visiting the campus every year. Average placements range between 4 to 5 LPA with the highest reaching up to 15 LPA.

Leading organizations such as Infosys, Accenture, IBM, and Wipro recruit students from Acharya Institute of Technology. The placement cell also provides training in communication, aptitude, and technical skills.
The placement department at AIT ensures industry readiness of students by organizing workshops, internships, and placement drives with leading multinational companies.

patterns: hostel facilities at acharya institute of technology
library and wifi in acharya institute
responses: Acharya Institute of Technology provides excellent hostel facilities for both boys and girls with 24 hour security, WiFi connectivity, and hygienic food. The campus includes a modern library, sports complex, gym, cafeteria, medical facilities, and transportation services.
AIT offers separate hostels for male and female students with comfortable rooms and all basic amenities. The college also provides WiFi enabled classrooms, laboratories, and a well equipped library.
The campus of Acharya Institute of Technology features state of the art infrastructure with hostels, laboratories, digital classrooms, canteens, gym, and transportation facilities.
AIT ensures a safe and convenient environment for all students with its residential hostels, library, WiFi access, sports complex, and dining facilities.

patterns: campus life at acharya institute of technology
culture of acharya institute of technology
life at acharya institute of technology
responses: Campus life at Acharya Institute of Technology is vibrant and dynamic with various student clubs, technical societies, and cultural activities. The annual fest Acharya Habba is one of the largest intercollegiate festivals in Bengaluru.
AIT promotes holistic development through student organizations such as coding clubs, music and dance clubs, sports teams, and cultural committees.
Students at Acharya Institute of Technology actively participate in workshops, seminars, hackathons, and the grand Acharya Habba event held every year.
The campus encourages extracurricular participation and creativity with numerous clubs and events that make student life engaging and memorable.
